name: Party Pooper (Maddiecorn)
description:
For downloadable Windows version, check below!

Instructions:

Keep the party poopers from ruining your fun!

Click to invite a person to your party.

The party poopers are afraid of dancing people!

Whatever you do, do NOT let the party poopers reach the music-stopping button.

There's no party without music!

Controls:

You have 1 minute to protect the button labeled STOP.

Click on the screen to create a character.

When a party pooper approaches the button, if they encounter a dancing character, they will turn back. They will then attept to approach the button again. If they are stopped again, they quit and leave.

You have a limit of 3 dancing characters at a time.

Credits coming soon...
